attributes.action: Name many more ships after British and French admirals who haven't yet had any ships named after them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many British and French admirals who have served their two nations admirably haven't yet had any ships named after them. That situation is a disgrace. We must redress it. By those admirals I mean leaders like Bertram Ramsay, Rhoderick McGrigor, Terence Lewin, Michael Le Fanu, Julian Oswald, William Staveley, Michael Pollock, Henry Leach and Timothy Laurence.
